item.title: Open IE Research
item.description: What is Open Information Extraction (OpenIE)? OpenIE is the Natural Language Processing task of extracting machine-readable information from free text (e.g. books, news, etc). Concretely, most OpenIE systems generate <subject, relation, object> tuples, e.g. “Barack Obama was President of the United States.” becomes <Barack Obama, was President of, the United States> or <Barack Obama, was, President of the United States>. OpenIE is useful for knowledge-base construction, fact-checking, What are the issues with existing systems?
